messages.content: What does the ComfyUI-Mirror node do?
The ComfyUI-Mirror node is used to mirror a latent along the Y or X axis. It is best used as part of an img2img workflow.
Can you provide an example JSON file for ComfyUI-Mirror?
Yes, an example JSON file can be found here: https://github.com/spro/comfyui-mirror/blob/main/examples/latent-mirror-example.json.
What are the examples images for ComfyUI-Mirror?
Example images for ComfyUI-Mirror can be seen here: https://github.com/spro/comfyui-latentmirror/blob/main/examples/example.png?raw=true.
To install ComfyUI-Mirror, you would clone the repo within `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` and restart and refresh ComfyUI.
What is the installation command for ComfyUI-Mirror?
The installation command is: `cd ComfyUI/custom_nodes && git clone https://github.com/spro/comfyui-latentmirror`.
